criteria.description: Evaluates the investor's enthusiasm and commitment to your project.
Considers the investor's track record with similar investments or industries.
Assesses current economic trends and industry dynamics affecting investment potential.
Measures alignment of investor interests with the team's vision and values.
Evaluates the investor's ability to meet the funding requirement and previous investments.
Determines the investor's understanding of the competitive landscape and your position.
Gauges how actively the investor has engaged with the project (e.g., meetings, questions).
Assesses whether the investor's preferred exit strategies align with your plans.
Considers the strength of personal connections that can influence trust and credibility.
